body: i use mac , the same problem appear both in dmg and crossplatform version.

issue.title: Change Sites tree renderer to use L&F colours

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change SiteMapTreeCellRenderer to use the colours of current L&F for
foreground colour of the text.

Fix #3351 - the url disappear when i click it

issue.title: Use renderer's label in Sites tree

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change SiteMapTreeCellRenderer to use/add the renderer's label, it
already has and paints the expected colours for fore and background.

Fix #3351 - the url disappear when i click it

body: There's confirmation that the issue is fixed, https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/pull/3420#issuecomment-295377299.

issue.title: Sites tree option Show only URLs in Scope not working

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in a following main release.

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Hello,
I am using ZAProxy in the latest version of Kali Linux with all updated packages. I browse a few sites using the proxy and then on the sites menu I add a site to the default context (https://ad.turn.com.* for example). Finally I select to "Show only URLS in Scope" but it does just nothing. I still see the every URL and the site list. I tried to renew the ZAProxy profile by deleting the /root/.ZAP folder, refreshing the site tree. I also double checked the Context to be in Scope.
What might be going wrong here?
Regards.

issue.title: Selected checkbox tree nodes not correctly highlighted in macOS

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Issue reported in OWASP ZAP User Group: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/zaproxy-users/8xw8VDLbO5U/PbOXDbOaAwAJ

The selected nodes in the checkbox tree are not correctly highlighted (like the Sites tree in #3351).

ZAP version:
Version 2.6.0 (older versions are also affected).

body: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
